[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview-decoder](./harp-mapview-decoder.md) &gt; [TileDataSource](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasource.md) &gt; [getTile](./harp-mapview-decoder.tiledatasource.gettile.md)

## TileDataSource.getTile() method

Create a \[\[Tile\]\] and start the asynchronous download of the tile content. The \[\[Tile\]\] will be empty, but the download and decoding will be scheduled immediately. \[\[Tile\]\] instance is initialized with default copyrights, concatenated with copyrights from copyright provider of this data source.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
/** @override */
getTile(tileKey: TileKey): TileType | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  tileKey | [TileKey](./harp-geoutils.tilekey.md) | Quadtree address of the requested tile. |

<b>Returns:</b>

TileType \| undefined
